title: How long does PBE acceptance take?
body: I feel like Riot has forgotten me... Been waiting for 3 months+ now...

replies.body:
Wait time can vary for each player signed up for PBE access. We don't invite everyone who signs up and our criteria for how we select testers changes all the time. Generally, we look for players who are a positive influence on the community and would provide great feedback to our teams. At this point, the best thing to do is to remain patient and continue to actively play.

For complete details on the PBE, check out our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top). Let me know if you have any questions.
Alright riot! Let's hope I get into it once kat rework comes out {{champion:55}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:55}}
There isn't a specific time frame and it can take a while for someone to get chosen for PBE.
